item.description:
Let's have a Singles Dinner Party and celebrate the holidays, too!  

 

I'd like to invite you to my home in Lexington on Friday, Dec 23rd from 7:00-10:00 pm. These dinner parties are different from the ones Richard hosted.  I am sure you will enjoy them just as much and meet some wonderfully interesting folks along the way.

 

How are these Singles Dinner Parties different?  

 

  • They are small gatherings of approximately 25 people (as gender balanced as possible) 
  • Some have a theme.
  • They have a combination of catered and pot luck (more on that later)
  • They are buffet style with comfortable places to sit and have conversation
  • I lead ice-breakers for fun and connection 
  • No alcohol is served; please bring one bottle of wine if you'd like to drink and share some

 

DETAILS

 

Please join me and other Singles Dinner Party Meetup guests for dinner Friday, Dec 23rd.  

 

This evening's theme will be "Intentions for 2012." I'll explain more as we get closer.  


I will provide a chicken main dish along with a vegetarian option (please let me know if you are vegetarian ahead of time).  

 

If your first name begins with A-L, please bring a side-dish to share with 3-4 others

If your first name begins with M-Z, please bring dessert to share with 3-4 others

 

We need a minimum of 16 Singles to make this Dinner Party happen!  So please check your calendar now and RSVP asap if you'd like to join us!  

 

I look forward to meeting you and so does everybody else!  

 

Feel free to email me with any questions.
item.name: Singles Dinner and Holiday Party
